channel.title: Server Status Page
channel.description: Okay I added http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.0.html to my website to look around in it and i made everything work but search and idk what happens here but when i register server it tells me it's going to login with a username and password but it never does... so it does not show up under registered servers does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’m not very experienced with vBulletin/IPB, it’s been a while since I’ve worked with both of them. It’s set up for integration using the SMF SSI, I’d stick with SMF forums. It seems like it’d be a better idea for you to just create your own toplist as opposed to using one that you have to more or less completely change.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @Mystic-Effect Mystic-Effect
item.description:
@Mystic-Effect wrote:

okay and is there a way to get it hooked up with ipb or vbulletin ive tried ipb with ssi but the logout login thing is messed up would u know how to fix?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

That’s because our current status page is linked with the moparscape webclient found on the homepage, disable it in the server status page code.

Read full topic
